long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PaintShop Pro Browser Extension.


















































PaintShop Pro for Chrome is a versatile photo editing tool tailored for quick and easy image adjustments right within your browser. With a user-friendly interface and a robust set of features, PaintShop Pro for Chrome lets you transform, enhance, and personalize your images on the go. Ideal for anyone looking to edit images directly in Chrome without the need for external software.

Key Features:
Brush and Eraser Tools: Use the brush for freehand drawing and the eraser to remove unwanted areas with precision.
Undo and Redo Functions: Easily correct mistakes and refine your edits with undo and redo buttons.
Image Adjustments: Adjust brightness, contrast, and apply blur or sharpen effects to make your images stand out.
Upload and Edit: Open local image files and start editing them directly in your browser.
Save Your Work: Export your creations with a single click and save them as PNG images.
This extension is designed for creatives, photographers, and anyone who needs to edit images quickly. Transform your Chrome browser into a photo editing studio with PaintShop Pro for Chrome! this is an unofficial extension
